New Records: Mayank Yadav reached 155 kph during the IPL, a significant speed record.
Varun Chakravarthy returns to the squad, providing a mystery spin option.
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav's ability to counter spin will be pivotal against Bangladesh's spin-heavy attack.
Riyan Parag's role as a finisher and part-time spinner will be crucial.
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh's spin-dominated bowling attack will be a key focus, with Shakib Al Hasan's influence being significant.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be hosted at Gwalior, offering a good batting surface with some assistance for spinners as the match progresses.
